Diamante’s convenient beachfront location offers the most exciting land and water Eco Adventure activities, including Costa Rica’s best Zip Line, which features the longest dual-line, ocean view, Zip Line in the Country; it also ranks within the top 5 in the World.Diamante’s aerial course includes the 1000' high zipline "The Full Monte", a free fall (Quick Jump) and the Tarzan Swing. Designed and engineered for fun and safety, Diamante’s Zip Line is Costa Rica’s must-do experience. The team of trained guides and state-of-the-art equipment enhances the entire experience. Diamante is recognized as #1 on Trip Advisor. Diamante’s Animal Sanctuary is Guanacaste’s largest and was built in partnership with La Paz Waterfall Gardens. Here guests can interact with animals, enjoy up close viewing and see a wide variety of species in one location. The rescue animals are donated by MINAE, the Costa Rican Ministry of Wildlife and include Sloths, Monkeys, Pumas, Jaguars, Toucans and more. Diamante is home to dozens of species of frogs, snakes, birds and a world-class butterfly observatory.Additional activities include ATV, Horseback, Hiking, Water sports, Mountain Biking, and more.

The Courtyard Palm Beach Jupiter, conveniently located in Abacoa Town Center, is near Abacoa Golf Club, Palm Beach Gardens, Roger Dean Stadium and many beautiful beaches. Catch the Florida Marlins and St. Louis Cardinals play at Roger Dean Stadium for MLB spring training or head to Abacoa Golf Club to play a round of golf with friends and colleagues. Enjoy complimentary business services and free Wi-Fi and easily access information on our interactive GoBoard®, unique among hotels in Jupiter, FL. Work and relax in modern accommodations with ergonomic work space and signature Marriott bedding. Choose from a variety of delicious menu selections served for breakfast, lunch and dinner at The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect.® and grab other essentials at The Market, open 24 hours at our Juno Beach, FL hotel. Host business meetings and special occasions in one of our 4 event rooms, offering 2,206 sq. ft. of total space. Whether traveling for business or leisure, the Courtyard Palm Beach Jupiter hotel is ideal.

www.RIGHTOFTHEDOT.com - High Profile Consulting Firm specializing in new and existing TLD (Top Level Domain) strategy, board advisement, premium domain and market positioning, sales and services.  We also specialize in contention resolution services for the new TLD Applicants, including private auction services and mediation.

Combining a holistic and analytical approach, we tailor solutions around one simple goal – maximum monetization of your domain assets. Whether it is our proprietary DomainPower monetization platform and marketplace or Premium Domain Brokerage services; or finding a third-party solution that exists in the domain marketplace, we are committed to growing your online business and domain portfolio at all stages of the domain life cycle. Led by a management team with over two decades of experience and reach across all industry verticals, we are honored to have the opportunity to work with your domain portfolio.

From the restaurateurs and culinary masterminds behind South Florida hot spots such as YOLO, O Lounge, Tarpon Bend and Vibe Las Olas, S3 – where sun, surf and sand uniquely fuse with steak, seafood and sushi – provides the ultimate in oceanfront dining, offering fresh coastal cuisine and the closest spot to the ocean anywhere along Fort Lauderdale beach.Upon entering, guests are whisked away to an island-chic retreat complete with indoor/outdoor bar and terraced dining complemented by a lush outdoor patio with fire pits and custom lounge seating, providing endless, breathtaking views of the ocean.Add to that a menu centered on sharable items, featuring the freshest daily catches and premium cuts of meat, and an expansive sushi bar to complement, and it’s clear that S3 is bringing a new wave of dining to Fort Lauderdale beach.Whether you’re joining us for cocktails, a celebratory meal, a business lunch or leisurely brunch, our team looks forward to welcoming you. S3 is open seven days a week, serving lunch, dinner and Sunday brunch. Thank you for visiting our online home!

summary: Monte is Co-Founder / President of RightOfTheDot, LLC, a licensed business & domain auction company, Internet consulting and advisement firm specializing in new and existing TLD strategy, Contention Resolution Services, board advisement, premium domain market positioning, sales and services. He was Founder and  CEO of Moniker.com, a leading ICANN Accredited Registrar and he was former President of SnapNames.com, a leading domain auction and expired domain business.  He is also an investor in Diamante Eco Adventure Park in Costa Rica, S3 Restaurant on Ft. Lauderdale Beach, FL, Bidtellect.com an online native advertising & marketing firm, and the Marriott Courtyard in Jupiter, FL. Monte has been pioneering domain and aftermarket services since 1995. During his time, he helped many new and existing TLD’s have successful launches through registrar promotions, sales & auctions of premium domains through marketing, brokerage and sales.  Monte has more than 26 years of experience in the healthcare, high technology and Internet fields. He was one of the early pioneers and started investing in domain names in 1995 and started the first online domain brokerage business in the industry. Success includes more than $370,000,000 in domain sales & brokerage, including the industry’s first domain name sale for over $1 million dollars with the sale of Wallstreet.com and the industry's first $2 million dollar domain sale with the sale of Autos.com in 1999. Later, he sold the highest dollar domain in history with the sale of Porn.com for $9.5M and Slots.com for $5.5mm. He is also the visionary behind Live and online Domain Auctions. He was also the creator of domain appraisals, domain escrow and WhoIs Privacy services, for the industry.Monte was voted into the 2010 Domain Hall of Fame by industry peers. He has spoken and presented at more than 150 industry conferences.Monte graduated from University of Kentucky with degrees in marketing, biology, and business administration.Specialties: Merger and Acquisitions in the Internet Industry, Domain name Registrations, Domain name sales and Auctions, appraisals, and escrow of sales, Domain name acquisitions, Corporate domain name management, Online branding, identity services and web presence, Health care and Medical device sales.
name: Monte Cahn
title: Founder / President of RightOfTheDot, LLC and business and real-estate investor
